post_subpoena_projections.description: Expected state after all P1 and P2 subpoenas successful

phase4_accomplishments: ✓ Gap_Filler: 100% success rate (73 blockchain items promoted)
✓ Subpoena package: 3 targets ready for issuance (146 blockchain wallets)
✓ Evidence quality: Average 4.0 effective sources per blockchain item
key_milestones: Gap Filler: 74 items processed, 73 promoted to Tier 2, 1 to Tier 3
Blockchain enrichment: 229 new corpus sources, 85%+ attribution
Subpoena coordination: 3 targets prioritized, P1 ready for immediate issuance

remaining_gaps.action_required: Continue investigative development for Tier 3 items

prosecution_readiness_gap.resolution: Issue P1 subpoenas (Nassau County + Coinbase) to upgrade 81+ items to Tier 1

immediate_next_steps: 1. Legal review and approve subpoena package (24-48 hours)
2. Issue Nassau County subpoena (within 7 days) - THE SMOKING GUN
3. Issue Coinbase KYC subpoena for 88 wallets (within 14 days)
4. Monitor responses and begin Tier 2→1 upgrades (30-60 days)
5. Issue secondary subpoenas (Kraken, Gemini, IRS-CI) per timeline
long_term_strategy: Complete all P1 subpoenas (Nassau County, Coinbase, Kraken, Gemini)
Upgrade 81+ blockchain items from Tier 2 to Tier 1 with KYC confirmation
Coordinate IRS-CI access via DOJ Tax Division for 1993 conviction records
Issue P2 subpoenas (Binance, NY Courts) after P1 responses received
Achieve 85%+ prosecution readiness (projected: 34.4% with all subpoenas)
